question.text: Emone Motor Company has not ___ any delays in production or delivery to dealerships this quarter.
___ the new office building is occupied, construction vehicles will not be allowed to use the main parking area.
Avoid placing the digital scale ___ a source of excessive heat, as this may damage sensitive electronic components.

answer.explanation:
"Despite" does not describe positions.
"Between" requires two objects
"Through" describes motion instead of position.
Therefore, we choose "near".

question.text: Dr. Weisman, who served for 25 years as an ___ part of the research team, will retire on March 30.

answer.explanation:
We are giving more information on the noun "part" so we use an adjective.
Integral = Necessary

question.text: Presidential candidate Christine Witherby spoke___ yesterday about her proposals for budget reform.

answer.explanation:
"Expensively" and "numerously" do not go with the verb "speak". There is already "yesterday" so we do not use "previously".
Therefore, we choose "publicly".

question.text: New patients should arrive fifteen minutes before their scheduled appointment time to allow ___ time to complete any paperwork.
Despite heavy competition from established carriers, Sopot Airlines has managed to do more than just ___ in the narrow luxury niche.

answer.explanation: Do more than just + V = Not just do st

question.text: The hiring committee had discussed the possibility of interviewing the candidates in person but decided in telephone interviews  ___.
Since its repair, the central heating system in the Rayburn Building is now in ___ order.

answer.explanation: Be inn working order = Be working

question.text: The directors voted to extend evening hours at local libraries to make them more ___ to patrons who cannot visit them during the day.

answer.explanation: Accessible to = Easy to go to
